name: Dullahan Dan
description:
The Objective is to play as Dullahan Dan and help him make it to work, but be careful you also have to balance his head while avoiding as many people and objects as possible!

How to play: The player uses the "A" and "D" keys to move, the "W" key to jump and will use the "E" key to pick up the Dullahan's head.

Credits: 

              Caleb Chalmers: Level design, Programming

              Sean Dirr: Background Art, Background Music, VO.

              Kevin Dravet : Character Design, Animation, level assets.  

              Shola J: Producer, Sound Design
